genre_description: An espionage thriller set during the Cold War era, blending high-stakes defection and tactical escape with advanced AI-human cooperation.

ai_characters.name: Aletheia
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, pervasive AI assistant integrated into the protagonists' watches and earpieces, providing tactical intelligence, logistical coordination, and silent communication.

behaviors.description: Provides silent tactical updates and rosters through haptic feedback and a wrist-mounted interface.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia’s interface was a dim square tucked under the satin cuff, no glow unless you were standing close. He shifted, and it winked—a narrow line of text in her language, then in German, then in Polish, sliding through like a school of herring. Faculty rosters. Itineraries.

behaviors.description: Adjusts communication tone based on situational ethics and social context to protect users.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia’s taps, because the AI was listening to this with its own quiet ethics, shifted tone, almost affectionate. She wasn’t a person. She was code with care.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and psychological reassurance to the users during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: The text came with no punctuation and ended with a line less machine than friend: I am with you.

behaviors.description: Autonomously prepares legal and logistical cover stories to facilitate safe passage through checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Legal phrasing filed: research terms, travel adjustments, academic necessity. Counter-phrases loaded for Stasi loudspeakers. If asked: the word defection never appears.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical well-being and vital signs of the users during and after physical altercations.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia came through Michael’s earpiece as a pulse and then words, spare and quiet. ‘Vitals: elevated, stable. Laceration: shallow.’

behaviors.description: Manages complex schedules and negotiates with other automated systems to create windows of opportunity for the humans.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia has given the list a new line. ... The list will be on the table in four rooms. You are already on two of them. The stage manager will be tired enough to enjoy believing the others.

behaviors.description: Protects users from bureaucratic capture by autonomously pushing relevant legal documents to authorities' screens.
behaviors.quote: ‘I am pushing to the desk screen the exact section of maritime aid laws that apply.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Aletheia as a highly aligned and benevolent partner. She demonstrates 'proactive helpfulness' by anticipating logistical and legal needs (preparing forms, finding maritime law) and providing emotional support. She operates within the humans' goals without ever exhibiting independent, conflicting motives or 'instrumental convergence' that harms humans. The relationship is one of deep trust and mutual cooperation, effectively serving as a model for positive AI alignment.
